post.body: Let me know when you find a Santa quiz, I'll do better :)
Just reply, "I don't know, I'm not psychic" :)
Thanks Jeff! Great phone call!
3yrs ago, mascara wand injury... couldn't see bright computer screen for a week... pain took me on vacation to another planet
I nominate @leesabarnes for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia because her preview SM 2009 Telesummit teleseminars rocked!!
Yippee!!! yw, glad it's fixed... now you won't need therapy... lol :)
k, just a sec... what exactly does it say?
Click Account Settings, it's under the Notifications tab
you probably already know, but @ErinBlaskie did at one point... apparently she was impersonating herself... hrmmm :)
I'd be interested in what you think about Buddypress in the months to come - keep us posted?
It's -20F here... knowing that, will it help make your run better? :)
pumPkin pie too.
Pumkin pie w/ real whipped cream
